categories: Category:Victory-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Sentinel was an Imperial Victory-class Star Destroyer. It was stationed at Wroona, where it conducted training exercises.

On one occasion, it boarded and searched the Brentaal Princess, but the troops under the command of Lieutenant Rowen failed to uncover the hidden ryll spice being smuggled onto the planet by Platt Okeefe.
